<a id="TextureLayered"></a>

# TextureLayered

**Inherits:** [Texture](Texture.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [CompressedTextureLayered](CompressedTextureLayered.md), [ImageTextureLayered](ImageTextureLayered.md), [PlaceholderTextureLayered](PlaceholderTextureLayered.md), [TextureLayeredRD](TextureLayeredRD.md)

Base class for texture types which contain the data of multiple [Image](Image.md)\\ s. Each image is of the same size and format.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Base class for [ImageTextureLayered](ImageTextureLayered.md) and [CompressedTextureLayered](CompressedTextureLayered.md). Cannot be used directly, but contains all the functions necessary for accessing the derived resource types. See also [Texture3D](Texture3D.md).

Data is set on a per-layer basis. For [Texture2DArray](Texture2DArray.md)\\ s, the layer specifies the array layer.

All images need to have the same width, height and number of mipmap levels.

A **TextureLayered** can be loaded with [ResourceLoader.load()](ResourceLoader.md#ResourceLoader_method_load).

Internally, Redot maps these files to their respective counterparts in the target rendering driver (Vulkan, OpenGL3).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_TextureLayered_LayeredType"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **LayeredType**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_TextureLayered_LayeredType)

<a id="TextureLayered_constant_LAYERED_TYPE_2D_ARRAY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LayeredType](TextureLayered.md#enum_TextureLayered_LayeredType) **LAYERED_TYPE_2D_ARRAY** = `0`

Texture is a generic [Texture2DArray](Texture2DArray.md).<a id="TextureLayered_constant_LAYERED_TYPE_CUBEMAP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LayeredType](TextureLayered.md#enum_TextureLayered_LayeredType) **LAYERED_TYPE_CUBEMAP** = `1`

Texture is a [Cubemap](Cubemap.md), with each side in its own layer (6 in total).<a id="TextureLayered_constant_LAYERED_TYPE_CUBEMAP_ARRAY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LayeredType](TextureLayered.md#enum_TextureLayered_LayeredType) **LAYERED_TYPE_CUBEMAP_ARRAY** = `2`

Texture is a [CubemapArray](CubemapArray.md), with each cubemap being made of 6 layers.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>
